page.title: 02Nettlebed School
page.content: Nettlebed Primary school has 75 children at the moment in 3 classes, it used to have 5.There are 3 full-time teachers and one part-time teacher.Children from Nettlebed, Huntercombe, Bix, and Assendon go to the school.There is a swimming pool which is quite large, at the moment we are raising money for a new swimming pool roof.There is a school hall which we use for P.E. At the moment we are building an adventure playground. We have already started to put things up. About 2 months ago we started to do woodwork which most people like.We thought it would be nice to sponsor a family Africa in a village called Lesotho.
